author: julianfoad
msg: Make the WC DB functions base_get_info() and read_info() return a repos id
instead of converting that to a URL+UUID, and do the conversion in the
wrappers instead, and thus simplify some callers.  No functional change.
repository root URL and UUID parameters with a repository id parameter.
read_info() and base_get_info(), and hence simplify.
